name: Mesprit
flavorText:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.”
It taught humans the nobility of
sorrow, pain, and joy.

previous.name: Uxie
previous.flavorText:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.”
It is said that it can wipe out the
memory of those who see its eyes.

next.name: Azelf
next.flavorText:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.”
It sleeps at the bottom of a lake
to keep the world in balance.
